## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G28120](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G28120)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>OTU1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ovarian tumor domain (OTU)-containing DUB (deubiquitilating enzyme) 1
- **Description:**   Major facilitator superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
